sources.title: Down the Wyoming Trail
sources.description: Tex Yancey (Tex Ritter) arrives on the Parker ranch on Christmas eve and is given the job of being Santa Claus. Also dressed as Santa Claus, Blackie (Bob Terry) robs Parker and kills a man. When Tex is arrested for the murder, he escapes and joins up with outlaw Becker (Charles King) and his gang. He finds Blackie's Santa Claus suit but is soon made a prisoner.

sources.title: Down the Wyoming Trail (1939) TEX RITTERüçï COWBOY CHRISTMAS

Stars: Tex Ritter, White Flash, Mary Brodel
Director: Albert Herman

On Christmas Eve, Tex rides onto the Parker ranch and lands an unlikely job‚Äîplaying Santa Claus. But when another man dressed as Santa, the outlaw Blackie, robs the ranch and kills a man, Tex is arrested for the crime. Escaping custody, Tex goes on the run and falls in with a gang led by the ruthless Becker. When he discovers Blackie's bloodstained Santa suit, Tex realizes he‚Äôs close to the truth‚Äîbut before he can act, he‚Äôs captured and plunged deeper into a deadly game of mistaken identity and betrayal.

metadata.Plot: Tex arrives on the Parker ranch on Christmas eve and is given the job of being Santa Claus. Also dressed as Santa Claus, Blackie robs Parker and kills a man. When Tex is arrested for the murder, he escapes and joins up with outlaw Becker and his gang. He finds Blackie's Santa Claus suit but is soon made a prisoner.
metadata.Actors: Tex Ritter, White Flash, Horace Murphy
